move_speed.description: The speed the hazard moves at.

height_change_speed.description: The speed the hazard can change height as it moves over the terrain

life_time_range.description: How long until the entity is removed

random_goal_range.description: Range of distance we move in direction of goal before picking a new goal.

random_goal_offset.description: Offset from goal that is randomly applied

goal_distance.description: Navigation distance to reach goal before picking new goal
